mapper.sql: id, level, yingcai, jiangcai, yuanshuai, status, type, data
mapper.select: select sum(yingcai) from fj_level_jy where level<= #{0}
select sum(jiangcai) from fj_level_jy where level<= #{0}
select sum(yuanshuai) from fj_level_jy where level<= #{0}
mapper.insert: insert into fj_level_jy (id, level, yingcai, jiangcai, yuanshuai, status, type, data) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yingcai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jiangcai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yuanshuai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into fj_level_jy
id,
level,
yingcai,
jiangcai,
yuanshuai,
status,
type,
data,

mapper.update:
update fj_level_jy
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yingcai = #{yingcai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiangcai = #{jiangcai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yuanshuai = #{yuanshuai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data = #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fj_level_jy set level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yingcai = #{yingcai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiangcai = #{jiangcai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yuanshuai = #{yuanshuai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data = #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
